queries.sql: SELECT actor_id FROM actor WHERE first_name IN${value};
SELECT actor_id FROM actor WHERE first_name IN${propOne} and last_name=${propTwo};
INSERT INTO actor(actor_id, first_name, last_name) VALUES (${actor_id}, ${first_name}, ${last_name});
INSERT INTO actor(actor_id, first_name, last_name) VALUES (${actor_id}, ${first_name}, ${last_name});
SELECT actor_id FROM actor WHERE first_name =${first_name} and last_name=${last_name};
SELECT actor_id FROM actor WHERE first_name =${value};
UPDATE actor SET first_name = ${value} WHERE first_name ="NICK";
UPDATE TABLE actor SET first_name = ${value} WHERE first_name ="RandomTest";
SELECT TABLE * FROM actor WHERE first_name=${value};
INSERT INTO actor(actor_id, first_name, last_name) VALUES ${state_1}, ${state_2};
DELETE FROM actor WHERE actor_id IN${value};
SELECT actor_id FROM actor where first_name = "JOHN";

SELECT `sakila`.`film`.`film_id` AS `FID`, `sakila`.`film`.`title` AS `title`, `sakila`.`film`.`description` AS `description`, `sakila`.`category`.`name` AS `category`, `sakila`.`film`.`rental_rate` AS `price`, `sakila`.`film`.`length` AS `length`, `sakila`.`film`.`rating` AS `rating`, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(UPPER(SUBSTR(`sakila`.`actor`.`first_name`, 1, 1)), LOWER(SUBSTR(`sakila`.`actor`.`first_name`, 2, LENGTH(`sakila`.`actor`.`first_name`))), _utf8mb4 ' ', CONCAT(UPPER(SUBSTR(`sakila`.`actor`.`last_name`, 1, 1)), LOWER(SUBSTR(`sakila`.`actor`.`last_name`, 2, LENGTH(`sakila`.`actor`.`last_name`)))))) SEPARATOR ', ') AS `actors` FROM ((((`sakila`.`category` LEFT JOIN `sakila`.`film_category` ON ((`sakila`.`category`.`category_id` = `sakila`.`film_category`.`category_id`))) LEFT JOIN `sakila`.`film` ON ((`sakila`.`film_category`.`film_id` = `sakila`.`film`.`film_id`))) JOIN `sakila`.`film_actor` ON ((`sakila`.`film`.`film_id` = `sakila`.`film_actor`.`film_id`))) JOIN `sakila`.`actor` ON ((`sakila`.`film_actor`.`actor_id` = `sakila`.`actor`.`actor_id`))) GROUP BY `sakila`.`film`.`film_id` , `sakila`.`category`.`name` HAVING `sakila`.`film`.`rating` IN ('G', 'PG');
